group_1.textLeft: Whew...@We're back!

group_1.textRight: Thank you for all of your hard work.

group_1.textLeft: We got fish and a lot of wild vegetables, and found@some of the village's appeal.
[chara:102601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'm really happy!

group_1.textRight: It's getting tiring to carry all this around,@[chara:102501:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102501:cheek_0][chara:102501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102501:lipSynch_1]so why don't we stop by my house?

group_1.textLeft: Sure.

group_1.textRight: You're getting more used to hiking, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
There's barely ever anything to do around here, so@I've been getting into wandering around in the@mountains.

group_1.textRight: Please be careful, then!@There are wild bears living there!

group_1.textLeft: Bears, schmears, we can scare 'em off!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* We can rely on you.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, it's Mrs. Tabata.

group_1.textRight: Hello there, did you just get back?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, the three of us will be having lunch together.

group_1.textRight: I see. Then you have perfect timing.
I was about to deliver some of the crops that...
...you helped me harvest over at Yamada's place yesterday.
I'll give you some, too.@Here you goâ€” homemade pickled turnips!

group_1.textLeft: Oh...is this really all right?@[chara:102701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102701:cheek_0][chara:102701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102701:lipSynch_1]Thank you very much...

group_1.textRight: Sunao...you can't fit much more into your hands,@can you?
Here, take this wicker basket.

group_1.textLeft: This is super helpful!@Thank you, granny!

group_1.textRight: No need to thank me.
Now, can you fit more into that basket?
If so, why don't you stop by my house and pick some@river spinach from the field?
Oh yes, and feel free to take some of the pea pods,@too.

group_1.textLeft: I'd feel terrible if we took too much from you...

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* Don't worry about it.
It's the least I can do considering all that you and@your friends have done for me.

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you so very much.@[chara:102701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102701:cheek_0][chara:102701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_100][chara:102701:lipSynch_1]We'll be sure to enjoy all this.
Ooh!
You're so kind, Sunao! No wonder you're a big hit@with all the old ladies!

group_1.textRight: No...it's not because of anything I do, really.
Mrs. Tabata and the other villagers...are simply kind@people.

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh! [chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_200][chara:102601:lipSynch_1]That could be another one of the village's@selling points!
*Nom*
[chara:102601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Mm-mmm!
The grilled fish and the vegetables are sooo yummy!

group_1.textRight: Thank you so much.

group_1.textLeft: So it's clear that the village has a lot of things we can@capitalize on...
Now we have to figure out how exactly we can do@that.

group_1.textRight: If Sunao uses her special skills to sell our products,
Then I think everyone in the village will help out.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, everyone is so drawn into your kindness,@Sunao.

group_1.textRight: ...I think Shizuka would be a better candidate than@I am.
In critical situations, like the one we're facing now,@Shizuka is the one everybody can rely on.

group_1.textLeft: I'm just the heir of the Tokime Clan...

group_1.textRight: It's not because of that alone.
You have a very strong sense of inner self. That's why@people put their trust in you.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Thanks.

group_1.textRight: What's the matter, Charu?

group_1.textLeft: I'm thinking...erm...
[chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hm?!
I...see...@I get it now.
